meaningMnemonic: The に on the end of this word turns <kanji>sincerity</kanji> into an adverb. What's the adverb version of sincerity? It's <vocabulary>sincerely</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>indeed</vocabulary>. It <vocabulary>really</vocabulary> is.
readingMnemonic:
This shares the same reading as the vocabulary word 誠, but here's a reminder just in case:

<reading>My coat</reading> (まこと) <vocabulary>really</vocabulary> is a coat! <vocabulary>Indeed</vocabulary>, it is.
